notes: الآخرة refers to the final abode and the life after death. The term آخر is used for 'other' or 'next,' and when used as الآخرة, it specifically denotes the hereafter, the eternal abode (دار الحياة الآخرة).

الإنسان is derived from 'uns' (socialility) or 'nasyan' (forgetfulness). It denotes the rational being composed of body and soul. آدم refers to the first human, created from earth (آدَمَ). البَرِيَّة means 'creation' and is used for all created beings.

القلب is the physical organ and center of thought/emotion. الفؤاد implies emotional intensity and is associated with burning feeling. الصدر is the chest, the seat of emotions and secrets. اللب is the intellect or core. البال is mindfulness and awareness.

الخشية is awe based on knowledge. التقوى is self-protection through piety. الرهبة is fear mixed with reverence. الوَجَل is trembling fear. السخط is authoritative displeasure; الغيظ is internalized anger.

الكتاب is a written scripture. القرآن is the recitation. الذكر is a reminder. الفرقان is the criterion. التنزيل is the revelation sent down. الوحي is inspiration. التفسير explains the outward meaning; التأويل extracts the intended, often metaphorical, meaning.
الجنة is the garden of bliss. الفردوس is the highest paradise. عدن is eternal abode. الروضة is a lush garden. دار السلام is the abode of peace.
النار is fire. جهنم is a deep pit. سقر is scorching fire. اللظى is blazing flame. الحطمة is that which shatters. السعير is blazing. الجحيم is fierce fire. الهاوية is abyss.
المغفرة is covering the sin. العفو is complete erasure. الصفح is overlooking. التوبة is repentance. الغفران is abundant forgiveness.
الريب is doubt that disturbs the heart. الشك is uncertainty between two equal possibilities. الامتراء is active doubt. الارتياب is doubt with suspicion. الظن can be conjecture or assumption.
الأبد is eternity from a starting point. السرمد is uninterrupted continuity. الدوام is continuance in all times. الأجل is a fixed term. الآن is the present moment between past and future.
المطر is general rain, often used for punishment in the Quran. الغيث is beneficial rain. الوابل is heavy rain. الطل is light rain. الصيب is rain that brings benefit.
النفس is the self, with its desires and tendencies. الروح is the divine breath that gives life. العقل is the intellect. القلب is the spiritual heart. الذات is the essence.
الجبل is a mountain. الطور is a mountain, especially Sinai. الرواسي are firm mountains. الرابية is a hill. الصخرة is a rock.
الصراط is the straight path. السبيل is a way. الطريق is a road. النهج is a clear method. المنهاج is the broad course. الشرعة is the beginning of a path; الملة is the religion as a path.
النور is light that illuminates others. الضياء is bright light. السراج is a lamp. المنير is that which gives light. الهدى is guiding light. البصيرة is inner light of understanding.
الظلمات are multiple darknesses. الغسق is evening darkness. الليل is night. الدجى is intense darkness. العتمة is gloom. الكمد is darkness of sorrow.
الذنب is a sin that deserves punishment. الإثم is a sin that corrupts the soul. الخطيئة is a fault. السيئة is an evil deed. الوزر is a burden. الجرم is a crime. المعصية is disobedience.

الصبر is endurance in difficulty. الحلم is forbearance and calmness. الأناة is deliberateness. الجلد is toughness. الثبات is steadfastness. الإمهال can be positive (giving time) or negative (delay without wisdom).

العلم is broad knowledge. المعرفة is recognizing and distinguishing. الفقه is deep understanding. الدراية is experiential knowledge. الحكمة is wisdom. البصيرة is insight. اليقين is certain knowledge that settles the heart. الرسوخ is deep-rooted, unshakable knowledge.

الآية is a fixed, clear sign (often Quranic verse). البينة is clear evidence. البرهان is decisive proof. السلطان is authoritative proof. العلامة is a general marker. السمة is a distinguishing mark. الرسم is a trace or outline. الإمارة is an indication.

الكلام is general speech. القول is an utterance. الحديث is conversation or report. الخبر is a report that can be true or false. النجوى is secret speech. السر is a hidden meaning in the heart. القسم is an oath emphasizing one's share. الحلف is an oath to cut off dispute.

الإرادة is will. المشيئة is divine will or decree. الشهوة is sensory desire. الهوى is blameworthy inclination. الرغبة is desire. العزم is decisive will. النية is premeditated intention. التمنّي is wishing for a missed benefit. الإزماع is resolution to depart.

الخلق is measuring and designing. الفعل is bringing into existence. الصنع is arranging with prior knowledge. العمل is producing an effect. الكسب is action that returns benefit or harm. الجرح is action with a limb. الإبداع is creating without precedent. التقدير is measuring. البرء is creating and also healing.

الواحد is oneness in essence and attributes. الأحد is absolute oneness, negating any plurality. الفرد is uniqueness without peer. الوحدانية is the state of being alone. الأوحد is surpassing others in a quality.

الكُل encompasses all parts. الجَمِيع encompasses all portions. البَعض is a divisible portion. الجُزء is an indivisible unit. السَّهم is a share (originally a sixth). النصيب is an allotted portion. الحصّة is a clear, allotted portion. القِسْط is a just share. الخَلاق is a generous, predestined portion of good.

الجسم is a three-dimensional body. الجرم is a natural constitution. الشَّخْص is an elevated, visible body. الجسد is a flesh-and-blood body. البدن is the fleshy part of the body. الصورة is the overall form. الهيئة is the visible state or form. الحلية is an added adornment. الصيغة is a structured form in language.

الصدق is truthful reporting. الحق is something in its rightful place. الحقيقة is the proper linguistic or ontological reality. الكذب is false reporting. الإفك is gross falsehood. الزور is falsehood made to appear good. البهتان is false accusation. الباطل is void falsehood. المُحال is impossible in conception and existence. الممتنع is impossible in existence only. المتناقض is self-contradictory.

الحب is love from both nature and wisdom. الوُد is natural affection. العشق is intense desire to attain the beloved. الغرام is deeper, more intense love. الولع/الوله/التيم are degrees of intense love and captivation.

الغضب is general anger. السخط is anger from a superior to an inferior. الغيظ is internalized, burning anger. الحقد is anger leading to malice and distance. الاشتياط is agitation in anger. الحمية is anger from zeal. الأسف is sorrow or anger; in Quranic usage, it can denote anger or regret.

الحمد is praise for good deeds. المدح is praise for deeds or qualities. الثناء is repeated praise. الإطراء is praise to one's face. الشكر is gratitude for favor. الذم is blame for bad deeds. الهجو is blame for qualities or character. السب is extended insult. الشتم is insult. اللعن is cursing. البَهْل is intense cursing. اللوم is critique, which can be for good or bad. العتاب is reproach for neglecting friendship. التوبيخ/التقريع are scolding. العيب is fault-finding. اللمز is fault-finding with accusation.

الدليل points to a meaning. البرهان is a decisive proof that witnesses to truth. الحجة is sound reasoning. الآية is an established sign. العلامة is a general marker. الإمارة is an apparent sign. البينة is clear evidence. السلطان is authoritative proof. الشهادة is testimony. العَلَم is a personal marker or sign.

الفرح is general joy, often temporary. السرور is deeper, lasting happiness. البهجة is visible delight. النشوة is intoxicating joy. الطرب is joy from music/poetry. الغبطة is joy for others without envy. الانشراح is expansion of the chest in joy. البُشر is the appearance of joy on the face.

القوة is physical or abstract power. القدرة is ability/potency. العزة is might and invincibility. المنعة is defensive strength. البأس is might in combat. الشدة is intensity. الصلابة is firmness. المضاء is resoluteness. البطش is violent power. الجبروت is overwhelming power. الهيمنة is dominance. الغلبة is victory through strength.

الضعف is general weakness. الوهن is weakness in structure or will. العجز is inability. الخور is weakness of heart/spirit. الفتور is slackening after strength. الاستكانة is submission from weakness. الذلة is humiliation. المهانة is degradation.

النوم is sleep. الرقاد is deep sleep. السبات is torpor/long sleep. الهجود is light sleep. السِّنَة is drowsiness. الغَفْوَة is a nap. الكَرَى is sleepiness. النوم is sometimes metaphorically used for death in the Quran.

الطعام is general food. الأكل is the act of eating. الرزق is provision/sustenance. القوت is necessary sustenance. الزاد is provisions for a journey. المؤنة is supplies. الغذاء is nourishment. الطعام in Quran can refer to both physical and spiritual nourishment.

الماء is essential for life, often used metaphorically for knowledge and revelation in the Quran. الشراب is drinkable water. المعين is flowing spring water. الينابيع are springs. السيول are torrents. الغدير is a small pond. الوَدْق is rain. المطر is rain (can be blessing or punishment).

الشمس is the sun (feminine in Arabic). القمر is the moon (masculine). النجم is a star. الكوكب is a planet/bright star. النجوم are stars used for navigation. السيَّارات are moving celestial bodies. الثواقب are piercing/shooting stars. المنازل are lunar mansions. الأبراج are constellations/zodiac signs. الشهب are meteors.

الريح is wind (can be singular or plural). الرياح are winds (plural). النسيم is gentle breeze. الهواء is air. العاصف is stormy wind. الصرصر is violently cold wind. العقيم is barren wind. اللواقح are fertilizing winds. المُبْشِرات are wind-bringers of good news. الذاريات are scattering winds. العاصفات are violent winds. الناشرات are spreading winds. القاصفات are cutting winds.

الشجرة is a tree. النبات is plant life. الزرع is cultivated crop. الحبة is a seed/grain. البذر is sowing. النوى is date seed. الغرس is planting. الشجر are trees collectively. الجَنَّة is a garden with trees. البستان is orchard. الحديقة is garden. العرجون is date-spathe. الطلح is acacia. السدر is lote-tree. الزيتون is olive. النخيل is palm trees. الأعناب are grapevines. الرمان is pomegranate. التين is fig. الريحان is basil/fragrant plants.

الحيوان is living creature. الدابة is any moving creature. البهيمة is livestock. السبع is predatory beast. الوحش is wild beast. الطير is bird. الحشرة is insect. الهوام are creeping creatures. الأنعام are cattle. الغنم are sheep/goats. البقر are cows. الإبل are camels. الخيل are horses. الحُمُر are donkeys. الكلب is dog. الذئب is wolf. الأسد is lion. الفيل is elephant. القرد is monkey. الخنزير is pig. العقرب is scorpion. الحية/الثعبان are snakes.

الحجر is stone/rock. الصخرة is large rock. الحجارة are stones. الجلمود is boulder. الصَّوان is flint. الرَّضْف is hot stones. السجيل is clay stone (from Persian). المدحاة is stone oven. المسمار is peg/nail. الحِجْر is sacred boundary/stone. الياقوت is ruby. الزبرجد is emerald/peridot. المرجان is coral. اللؤلؤ is pearl.

الذهب is gold. الفضة is silver. الحديد is iron. النحاس is copper/brass. الرصاص is lead. القصدير is tin. المعادن are metals/minerals. الجواهر are gems/jewels. الحلية is adornment. الزينة is ornamentation. السوار is bracelet. الخاتم is ring. القلادة is necklace. العقد is necklace/string of beads. التاج is crown.

الثوب is garment. اللباس is clothing/covering. الكسوة is covering/garment. الرياش is fine clothing. الحُلل are fine garments. السرابيل are shirts/coats. الإزار is waist-wrapper. الرداء is cloak. الجلباب is outer garment. القميص is shirt. السراويل are trousers. العمامة is turban. النعل is sandal. الخف is boot. القباء is cloak. البُرد is striped cloak. الحرير is silk. الإستبرق is thick silk brocade. السندس is fine silk. القطيفة is velvet.

البيت is house/home. الدار is dwelling/abode. المسكن is residence. المنزل is stopping place/house. المأوى is refuge/shelter. المساكن are dwellings. القصر is palace/castle. الغرفة is room. الحجرة is room/chamber. الصومعة is cell/hermitage. الصرح is lofty building/palace. العرش is throne/canopy. القبة is dome. الخيمة is tent. الفسطاط is large tent. المضرب is tent/dwelling. الوكر is lair/nest. العش is nest. الجحر is burrow.

السفينة is ship. الفلك is ark (Noah's ark). الجارية is sailing ship. القوارب are boats. المركب is vessel/boat. السفن are ships. البحرية are sea-going vessels. العرم is dam/ship barrier. النو is ship (archaic). الصندوق is box/ark (Moses).

السلاح is weapon. السيف is sword. السهم is arrow. القوس is bow. النبل are arrows. الرمح is spear. الحربة is lance. السِّنان is spearhead. الدرع is shield/armor. الترس is shield. المغفر is helmet/coat of mail. الخوذة is helmet. السِّلْم is peace (opposite of war). الحرب is war. القتال is fighting. الجهاد is struggle.

الصوت is sound/voice. النغمة is musical note. اللحن is melody/tune. الغناء is singing. الموسيقى is music. الأصوات are voices/sounds. الهتاف is cheering. النداء is call. المناداة is calling out. التكبير is saying 'Allahu Akbar'. التهليل is saying 'La ilaha illa Allah'. التسبيح is glorification. التحميد is praise. الصيحة is shout/scream. الزفير is exhalation. الشهيق is inhalation. النفس is breath. الصفير is whistling. الزقوم is boiling/roaring sound. الرنين is ringing. الدوي is reverberation.

اللون is color. الألوان are colors. البياض is whiteness. السواد is blackness. الحمرة is redness. الصفرة is yellowness. الخضرة is greenness. الزرقة is blueness. الأشهب is gray/white mixed. الأشقر is blond/fair. الأدهم is dark/black. Colors in Quran often have symbolic meanings: white for purity, black for darkness/mourning, green for life/paradise.

العدد is number. الرقم is digit/number. الكمية is quantity. المقدار is amount/measure. القليل is few/little. الكثي� is many/much. العدة is count/number. التعداد is enumeration. الحساب is calculation. الإحصاء is census/counting. Numbers in Quran have both literal and symbolic meanings (e.g., 7 for perfection, 40 for completion).

الطب is medicine. الدواء is remedy/medicine. الشفاء is healing/cure. العلاج is treatment. الرقية is incantation for healing. التعويذة is charm/amulet. الترياق is antidote. البرء is recovery. العافية is wellness. الصحة is health. الوقاية is prevention. الحفظ is preservation/protection. العِلَّة is illness/cause. المرض is sickness. السقم is chronic illness. الوجع is pain. الألم is pain/suffering. الحمى is fever. السعال is cough. الزكام is cold.

الموت is death. الوفاة is passing away/death. الهلاك is destruction/death. الفناء is annihilation. الرحيل is departure. الانتقال is transition. القضاء is divine decree/death. الأجل is appointed term. المنية is death/destiny. الحَتْف is violent death. الرَمَق is last breath. السكرات are agonies of death. النزع is soul extraction. الاحتضار is death throes. الممات is death. الفوت is missing/death. الذهاب is going away. الزوال is passing away. الانقضاء is expiration.

الحياة is life. العيش is living/livelihood. البقاء is permanence/continued existence. الوجود is existence. النشأة is creation/growth. النفس is breath/life. الروح is spirit/soul. النطفة is sperm-drop. العلقة is clinging clot. المضغة is chewed lump (embryo stage). العظام are bones. اللحم is flesh. النشور is resurrection. البعث is raising to life. النشأة الأخرى is the next life. الحَيَوَان is life/intense life.
